Package com.flipkart.business

Interface ScheduleServiceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScheduleService
    public interface ScheduleServiceInterface
    This interface defines the service operations related to Schedule functionality. It includes methods for creating schedules, retrieving schedules by date and slot ID, modifying schedules, checking availability, getting all available slots by date, and getting or creating a schedule for a specific slot and date.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • createSchedule

        Schedule createSchedule​(java.sql.Date date,
                        java.lang.String slotId)
        Creates a new schedule for a specific date and slot.
        Parameters:
        date - The date for the schedule
        slotId - The ID of the slot for the schedule
        Returns:
        Schedule object representing the created schedule

      • getScheduleByDateAndSlotId

        Schedule getScheduleByDateAndSlotId​(java.lang.String slotId,
                                    java.sql.Date date)
        Retrieves a schedule based on the provided slot ID and date.
        Parameters:
        slotId - The ID of the slot
        date - The date for which the schedule is retrieved
        Returns:
        Schedule object representing the details of the schedule

      • modifySchedule

        boolean modifySchedule​(java.lang.String scheduleId,
                       int action)
        Modifies a schedule based on the provided schedule ID and action.
        Parameters:
        scheduleId - The ID of the schedule to be modified
        action - The action to be performed on the schedule
        Returns:
        True if the modification is successful, false otherwise

      • checkAvailability

        java.util.List<Schedule> checkAvailability​(java.lang.String centreID,
                                           java.sql.Date date)
        Checks the availability of schedules for a specific gym center and date.
        Parameters:
        centreID - The ID of the gym center
        date - The date for which availability is checked
        Returns:
        List of schedules available for the specified gym center and date

      • getAllAvailableSlotsByDate

        Parameters:
        centreID - The ID of the gym center
        date - The date for which available slots are retrieved
        Returns:
        List of available slots for the specified gym center and date
